data.description: Interface to IBM WebSphere Payment Manager
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
IBM::WebSphere::Payment is an interface to the WebSphere Commerce
    Payments (former Payment Manager) part of the WebSphere suite of
    IBM. So that suggest the namespace. IBM is the root level because is
    a Commercial provider, WebSphere is the suite of products and
    finally Payment is the product itself.

    Actually there is no such a public perl interface to this software.
